import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { AcademicCapIcon, HandRaisedIcon, HeartIcon, ComputerDesktopIcon, UserGroupIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' const Home = () => { const fadeIn = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.6 } } const cardHover = { scale: 1.05, transition: { type: "spring", stiffness: 300 } } return (
Welcome to GenLink Bridging generations through technology, creating meaningful connections that last a lifetime.

Interactive Learning

Engage in creative projects that bridge generations through technology and shared experiences. Our platform offers:

  • • Virtual workshops and tutorials
  • • Interactive coding sessions
  • • Digital storytelling projects

Community Building

Foster meaningful connections in our vibrant community through:

  • • Weekly virtual meetups
  • • Mentorship programs
  • • Group activities and events

Personal Growth

Develop new skills and expand your horizons through:

  • • Skill-sharing workshops
  • • Personal development tracks
  • • Certificate programs

Why Choose GenLink?

Meaningful Connections

Build lasting relationships across generations

Expert Guidance

Learn from experienced mentors

Supportive Community

Join a welcoming and inclusive environment

Join Our Community

Be part of a movement that brings generations together through technology and shared learning. Start your journey today!
